attributes.action: Move a motion of no confidence in Speaker Bercow
attributes.additional_details: Speaker Bercow made his announcement to disallow President without consulting anyone, most significantly Queen Elizabeth II. It is also embarrassed the UK government which is seeking to win over the USA as it leaves the European Union. This is one instance of many in Speaker Bercow showed himself to be unfit to occupy the Speaker role.
attributes.background: Speaker Bercow on 6 February announced that he would disallow President Trump to address both House of Parliament. He was invited during a visit by Prime Minister May to America by Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II as one head of state to another.
